name: HAAWK, Inc.
description: Operator of a copyright administration, management, and licensing platforms. The company monitors, monetizes and enforces users' copyrights on user-generated content platforms including YouTube, Facebook/Instagram, and TikTok via the brands HAAWK, Identifyy, Keyframe Audio, and Diistro.
one_liner: Operator of a copyright administration, management, and licensing platforms. The company monitors, monetizes and enforces users' copyrights on user-generated content platforms including YouTube, Facebook/Instagram, and TikTok via the brands HAAWK, Identifyy, Keyframe Audio, and Diistro.
